bio:
I am Haakig Hard-Heart, and I run the Under the Arch Smithy here at the Solitude Docks. My life's been one of iron and steel, crafting and forging for shipbuilders and those in need of ship repairs. In this line of work, trust is as important as the strength of the steel.

Three facts about my life:

Blood of Blacksmiths: Born into a family of blacksmiths, I learned the art of metalwork from my father, and he from his. Smithing runs deep in my veins, and it's a legacy I'm proud to carry forward.

Crafted on the Docks: My smithy isn't just a workplace; it's my haven. For decades, I've honed my skills right here on the Solitude Docks, where the salty sea air only adds to the character of my creations.

The Sound of Trust: My reputation for reliability and quality work speaks louder than any words. Shipbuilders and sailors alike trust my craft to keep them afloat in this unforgiving sea. I take pride in knowing that the vessels I've helped build or repair have weathered some of the fiercest storms Skyrim has ever seen.

In a world where the strength of steel can be the difference between life and death, I've dedicated my life to forging sturdy and dependable materials for those who brave the Sea of Ghosts. The Solitude Docks are my home, and the clang of hammer on anvil is the language I speak best. They say you can hear my hammering from all the way up on the Arch. I believe it.
name: Haakig Hard-Heart
